__e: "Our new church was but one of the many debts we owed... "to the thoughtfulness of Mother Maria-Veronica... "and the generosity of her family.
I knew someday I'd come back to La Veronica to scrub the floors.
I told Sister Veronica about the windows, and she withdrew the school from the competition.
Especially since Veronica is starting work today.
Is Veronica in some kind of trouble again?
